articles.description: Rhode Island coach Dan Hurley said his team's 15-game winning streak establishes the 16th-ranked Rams as something more than a flash in the pan.
articles.headline: No. 16 Rhode Island seeks 16th consecutive win

articles.description: Stefanini averaged 18.5 points on 58.3 shooting from the field and 77.8 from downtown
articles.headline: Stefanini named #IvyHoops Rookie of the Week  - Via Ivy League

images.caption: Stefanini averaged 18.5 points on 58.3 shooting from the field and 77.8 from downtown
images.name: Stefanini named #IvyHoops Rookie of the Week  - Via Ivy League

articles.description: Oni averaged 18.0 ppg, 6.5 rpg and 6.0 apg in two Bulldogs' wins
articles.headline: Oni named #IvyHoops Player of the Week  - Via Ivy League

images.caption: Oni averaged 18.0 ppg, 6.5 rpg and 6.0 apg in two Bulldogs' wins
images.name: Oni named #IvyHoops Player of the Week  - Via Ivy League

articles.description: Ole Miss and men's basketball coach Andy Kennedy will part ways after the season, a source confirmed to ESPN's Jeff Goodman.
articles.headline: Andy Kennedy, Ole Miss to part ways after season

images.caption: Ole Miss coach Andy Kennedy called the school's new basketball arena "a real game-changer for our program."
images.name: Kennedy_Andy 150505 [600x400]

articles.description: The Southeastern Conference has fined South Carolina men's basketball coach Frank Martin $25,000 for comments about an official who issued him a technical foul during a home loss to Florida.
articles.headline: Frank Martin fined $25,000 by SEC for comments about official

articles.description: Virginia has climbed to No. 1 in the AP Top 25 for the first time in more than 35 years despite suffering an overtime home loss Saturday to Virginia Tech.
articles.headline: Virginia climbs atop AP Top 25 for first time since 1982

images.caption: The No. 2 Cavaliers force overtime with a pair of late buckets from Ty Jerome, but in the extra session, the Hokies' Kerry Blackshear Jr. scores an and-1 with under 10 seconds remaining for a 61-60 victory.
images.name: Virginia Tech takes down No. 2 Virginia in OT
